skill.name: Athletics
entries: Represents the ability to perform physically demanding tasks such as swimming, climbing, jumping, and running great distances.

skill.name: Brawn
entries: Represents the ability to apply your brute force efficiently, such as when breaking down a door, lifitng a heavy object, or pushing a boulder out of the way.

skill.name: Finesse
entries: Represents your fine motor skills, to be used when pickpocketing, picking locks, or contorting to fit into a tight space.

skill.name: Stealth
entries: Represents your ability to perform tasks undetected, such as remaining unseen in dark alleyway, or sneaking up to or past someone without being heard.

skill.name: Magiscience
entries: Represents your knowledge and research ability in matters relating to engineering, the sciences, or magic.

skill.name: History
entries: Represents your knowledge and research ability in matters relating historical events, whether recent or ancient.

skill.name: Medicine
entries: Represents your knowledge and application of knowledge, and your research ability, in matters relating to medicine and the bodies of living creatures.

skill.name: Nature
entries: Represents your knowledge and application of knowledge, and your research ability, in matters relating to terrain, plants, and wildlife.

skill.name: Insight
entries: Represents your intuition and your ability to pick on social clues, such as when determining if a person is being honest, or identifying a person who seems nervous.

skill.name: Investigation
entries: Represents your ability to find hidden information in an area, such as hidden doors or compartments.

skill.name: Perception
entries: Represents the keenness of your sight, smell, and hearing, to be used when identifying or noticing subtle events and stimuli.

skill.name: Survival
entries: Represents your ability to navigate and track, such as identifying and following tracks, or avoiding getting lost.

skill.name: Deception
entries: Represents your ability to seem trustworthy while lying and otherwise misleading others, including with your appearance.

skill.name: Intimidation
entries: Represents your ability to convince and scare others via threat, hostile actions, and physical violence.

skill.name: Persuasion
entries: Represents your ability to convince a person or a crowd with a convincing argument or your affable nature.
